Class UomIdentifier

Namespace
NDSH.Geospatial.Gml.BasicTypes
Assembly
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.ISO19115.Ed2003.dll

The UomIdentifier defines the syntax and value space of the unit of measure identifier. Represents a Unit of Measure (UOM) Identifier in GML.

[IsoType("UomIdentifier")]
[JsonObject("UomIdentifier")]
public class UomIdentifier : ObservableDbEntity, IModel, IObservableModel, INotifyPropertyChanged, IDbId, IValue<string>

Remarks

The UomIdentifier class defines a union of two possible representations:

  • A conventional unit symbol (e.g., "kg", "m/s") following the "The Unified Code for Units of Measure" (UCUM) standard.
  • A URI reference to a unit of measure definition.
This allows either a symbolic representation or a reference-based representation>.

Properties

Value

Gets/Sets the Unit of Measure (UOM) identifier, which can be either:

  • A UOM symbol (e.g., "kg", "m/s").
  • A UOM URI reference (e.g., "http://example.com/unit").
[JsonProperty("value")]
public required string Value { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Remarks

This property ensures that the value conforms to either:

  • The UOM Symbol pattern defined in UomSymbol.
  • The URI pattern defined in UomUri.
